text: The Virgin Queen is a 1955 American period drama movie directed by Henry Koster and starring Bette Davis, Rod Taylor, Richard Todd, Joan Collins, Nelson Leigh, Herbert Marshall, Jay Robinson, Dan O'Herlihy. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1956. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Henry Koster
title: The Virgin Queen (movie)
